mapper.sql: permission_code, menu_name, menu_url, parent_menu, css_style, enabled
t.permission_code, t.menu_name, t.menu_url, t.parent_menu, t.css_style, t.enabled
mapper.select:
select
from u_menu_info t, u_role_auth rm, u_role r, u_user_role ur where r.role_code = ur.role_code and rm.role_code = r.role_code and rm.permission_code = t.permission_code and ur.enabled = 1 and r.enabled = 1 and rm.enabled = 1 and t.enabled = 1 and ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
insert into u_menu_info
permission_code,
menu_name,
menu_url,
parent_menu,
css_style,
enabled,
#{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cssStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update u_menu_info
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_menu = #{parentMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
css_style = #{cssStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
where permission_code = #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update u_menu_info set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_menu = #{parentMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, css_style = #{cssStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT} where permission_code = #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
